preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 15.00 g of Lithium Acetate using a precision scale.  
 2. Measure 150.00 g of Lead (II) Oxide.  
 3. Measure 30.00 g of Zinc Oxide.  
 4. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine all three powders thoroughly using a spatula or mixer to ensure uniform distribution.
